Certificate Programs









Certificate Programs






					                       Certificate programs are designed to help you advance or change in your career by providing an in-demand skill set. Ideal for working professionals, certificate programs are shorter than traditional programs and provide immersive and hands-on learning.
				







Business



Business Analysis
Business Fundamentals
Community Association Management
Digital Marketing
Effective Management
Human Resources Management
Leadership Development
Lean Six Sigma Green Belt
Municipal Financial Management
Project Management
Graduate Certificate in Human Resources Management









Crime & Forensics



Computer Forensics
Private Investigation
Crime and Intelligence Analysis
Cyber Security

Professional Fiduciary Management for Conservators

What's Your Next Step?

					                       Learn how to successfully take courses online or join our email list. By joining our email list, we will send you important program updates.

Getting Started ?






Online Form - Prof Dev Master Email Sign-up - Clean up COPY





Non-California Residents

					                       Due to state and federal regulations, non-California residents may only enroll in CSUF online courses when their state has authorized CSUF as a provider. You can learn more about online program eligibility on the  State Regulations page.
